definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: In a wide sense of the word, criminology includes penology.
sentences.chinese: 從廣義上講，犯罪學包括刑罰學。

sentences.english: The theory of criminology is the scientific foundation of mitigation of punishment.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪學理論的發展爲刑罰輕緩化提供了科學實證根據。

sentences.english: Only can those criminologists account for the causes to the growth of crime rate.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些犯罪學家才能解釋爲什麼犯罪率會持續上升。

sentences.english: The thoughts on criminology originated in Xia, Shang and Zhou Periods in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代的犯罪學思想最早可追溯到夏商周三代時期。

sentences.english: Criminologists studied price-gouging and the breakdown of social order.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪學家則研究哄擡物價及社會失序的情況。

sentences.english: The crime of infringement on copyright has different meaning in criminal law and criminology.
sentences.chinese: 侵犯著作權犯罪在刑法學和犯罪學上具有不同的意義。

sentences.english: This volume is one of a series of Monograph Supplements to the Journal of Criminal Law and Criminology.
sentences.chinese: 此卷是一種專論補編系列之一的刑法和犯罪學雜誌。

sentences.english: According to the category of discipline functions, criminology can be included in criminal science.
sentences.chinese: 按學科功能歸類，犯罪學可以歸於刑事科學。

sentences.english: And experts who study criminology say that some crimes do seem to be contagious.
sentences.chinese: 研究犯罪學的專家說，有些罪行似乎會蔓延的。

sentences.english: The relationship between victimology and criminology is a longstanding issue within the academic realm.
sentences.chinese: 被害人學與犯罪學之間的關係問題是學界的一個宿疑。

sentences.english: RD: You looking to become a penologist?
The culture of folk-custom was of great importance n criminology.
sentences.chinese: 民俗文化在犯罪學中有著重要的功用。

sentences.english: The culture of folk-custom was of great importance in criminology.
sentences.chinese: 民俗文化在犯罪學中有着重要的功用。

sentences.english: The Garofalo's theory of nature crime was the dawn of the moral criminology.
sentences.chinese: 加羅法羅的“自然犯罪觀”是道德犯罪學的啓蒙。

sentences.english: Many still think in terms of traditional criminology .
sentences.chinese: 許多人還用傳統的犯罪學思考問題。

definition: to serve as a model for others (idiom)/to be a worthy teacher
to help a mother give birth
